CHAT.comment: diary for nina22: nina's father arrived from the eastcoast a few days ago. it was the first time nina had seen him in six months. she was very excited about his visit. she has been staying with her father for the last few days. nina's father's speech will be distinguished from nina's mother by a "d" mechanical problems with the tape recorder which appeared after the first few minutes made nina's speech difficult to decipher. nina is finishing up her supper at a little table in her room.

u.a: nina takes a big swallow of apple juice
nina mumbles some sentences which are not distinguishable
mother points to nina's Daddy
"refrigerator" mispronounced as "(re)frigerator ."
mother emphasizes the "re" of "refrigerator ."
last sentence garbled . nina hesitates in the middle of the word "refrigerator ."
nina mispronounces "potatoes" during this taping session .
mother puts some meat and potatoes on nina's plate .
"wipe" mispronounced .
"spaghetti" mispronounced .
nina yells . the next sentence is garbled .
last three sentences are hard to understand . our neighbor , mrs . wood , had just made a cake and given nina a piece .
Maya is a friend of nina's mother . nina and her mother had gone for supper at Maya's house once and had had cake for dessert .
"chocolate" mispronounced .
mother points to the cake on nina's table .
nina's is sitting on the floor of her room eating radishes .

laughs .
nina has been eating mrs . wood's cake that crumbles very easily .

laughs .

is still eating radishes . nina tries to take one of Mother's radishes .

points to nina's seat in front of the table .
nina goes and sit's on her mother's lap .
mother gives nina a big hug .

nina goes into the next room .
nina is in the kitchen . she is too far away for the tape recorder to pick up her words .
nina comes back with a fork .

justin is maggie's one year old boy .
justin learned how to walk recently .
justin is taking bites out of a radish and spitting them out .
is drinking beer .
last two sentences not clear .
mother looks at a big red bag that mrs . wood had just given to nina . it is one of her old handbags .
mother does not understand that nina is referring to the letter inside .
mother misunderstands and thinks nina is talking about her friend leila .
mother did not understand "person ."
mother had not seen nina for several days while nina stayed with her mother .

mother laughs .

laughs .

has long hair . mother brushes his hair forward to form bangs .
